# Komite Audit

# Audit Committee

Komite Audit merupakan bagian dari organ governansi korporat yang bertanggung jawab untuk memastikan keakuratan laporan keuangan Perseroan, mematuhi peraturan, dan mengelola risiko dengan efektif. Komite ini memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris terkait audit internal dan eksternal serta membrantu mengidentifikasi dan mengatasi potensi risiko.

# Dasar Hukum

Komite Audit Perseroan dibentuk sesuai dengan ketentuan dalam Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015 ingin Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Auditanya Surat Keputusan Dewan Komisaris.

The Audit Committee is an integral part of the Company's corporate governance structure, responsible for ensuring the accuracy of the Company's financial statements, regulatory compliance, and effective risk management. This committee provides recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding both internal and external audits and assists in identifying and addressing potential risks.

# Legal Basis

The Company's Audit Committee was established in accordance with the provisions of OJK Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015 on the Establishment and Implementation Guidelines for the Audit Committee,

Selain itu, pengaturanya juga merujuk pada Undang-Undang No. 40 Tahun 2007tentang Perseroan Terbatas, yang menetapkan pentingnya dapatapan governansi korporat untuk mendukung transparansi dan akuntabilitas Perseroan. Dengan berlandaskan pada kerangka hukum tersebut, Komite Audit memiliki peran strategis dalam menckatkan kualitas governansi korporat yang diterapkan. Komite Audit bertanggung jawab kepada Dewan Komisaris dan dalam keseharianya mematuhi Piagam Komite Audit yang telah disusun oleh Dewan Komisaris.

Masa jabatan anggota Komite Audit tidak dapat melebihimasa jabatan Dewan Komisaris dan kepada diperpanjang 1 (satu) kaliASA jabatan berikutnya.Seluruh biaya yang Berkaitan dengan pelaksanaantugas Komite Audit menjadi tanggung jawab Perseroan, sementara pemberian honorarium ditetapkan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Piagam Komite Audit

Piagam Komite Audit telah disahkan oleh Dewan Komisaris pada tanggal 1 Agustus 2013. Dokumen ini mencakup pengaturan mengenai struktur keanggotaan, wewenang, tanggung jawab, dan tata cara kerja Komite Audit yang sesuai dengan peraturan perundangan yang berlaku.

Piagam Komite Audit mencakup aspek-aspek terkait Komite Audit dengan rincian seksagai berikut:

1. Persyaratan Keanggotaan Komite Audit;  
2. Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Audit;  
3. Wewenang Komite Audit;  
4. Rapat Komite Audit;  
5. Pelaporan oneself Komite Audit;  
6. Penanganan Pengaduan atau Laporan Terkait Dugaan Pelanggaran Pelaporan Keuangan; ada  
7. Masa Jabatan dan Honorarium Komite Audit.

Piagam Komite Audit secara berkala ditinjau dan diperbarui agar tetap relevant dengan dinamika bisnis dan perubahan regulasi. Piagam ini dapat diakses oleh publik melalui situs web resmi Perseroan.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Audit

1. Melakukan penelaahan atas informasi keuangan yang akan Perseroan,seperti laporan keuangan, projeksi, dan informasi keuangan lainnya;

as well as the Board of Commissioners' Decision Letter. Additionally, its governance refers to Law No. 40 of 2007 on Limited Liability Companies, which underscores the importance of corporate governance in supporting transparency and accountability. Based on the legal framework, the Audit Committee has a strategic role in improving the quality of corporate governance that is implemented. The Audit Committee is responsible to the Board of Commissioners and in its day-to-day activities to comply with the Audit Committee Charter prepared by the Board of Commissioners.

The term of office of Audit Committee members cannot be longer than the term of office of the Board of Commissioners and can only be extended for 1 (one) subsequent term of office. All costs related to the implementation of the Audit Committee's duties are the responsibility of the Company, while the provision of honorarium is determined by the Board of Commissioners.

# Audit Committee Charter

The Audit Committee Charter was approved by the Board of Commissioners on August 1, 2013. The document outlines the arrangements regarding membership structure, authority, responsibilities, and working procedures of the Audit Committee in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.

The Audit Committee Charter incorporates the following aspects related to the Audit Committee:

1. Requirements for Audit Committee Membership;  
2. Duties and Responsibilities of the Audit Committee;  
3. Authority of the Audit Committee;  
4. Audit Committee Meeting;  
5. Reporting by the Audit Committee;  
6. Complaint or Report Handling Related to Alleged Financial Reporting Violations; and  
7. Term of Office and Honorarium of Audit Committee.

The Audit Committee Charter is periodically reviewed and updated to remain relevant with business dynamics and regulatory changes. This charter is accessible by the public through the Company's official website.

# Audit Committee Duties and Responsibilities

1. Reviewing the financial information to be released by the Company, such as financial statements, projections, and other financial information;

2. Melakukan penelaahan atas ketaatan Perseroan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan di bidang Pasar Modal dan peraturan perundang-undangan lainnya yang berhubungan dengan kegiatan Perseroan;  
3. Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai penunjukan Akuntan Publik yang didasarkan pada independensi, ruang lingkup penugasan, dan fee;  
4. Memberikan pendapat independen dalam hal terjadi perbedaan pendapat antara manajemen dan Akuntan atas jasa yang diberikannya;  
5. Melakukan penelaahan atas pelaksanaan pemeriksuan oleh auditor internal dan mengawasi pelaksanaan tindak lanjut oleh Direksi atas temuan auditor internal;  
6. Melaporkan kepada Komisaris berbagai risiko yang dihadapi Perseroan dan pelaksanaan manajemen risiko oleh Direksi;  
7. Melakukan penelaahan dan melaporkan kepada Komisaris atas pengaduan yang Berkaitan dengan proses akuntansi dan pelaporan keuangan Perseroan;  
8. Menjaga kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi Perseroan;  
9. Melakukan penelaahan dan memberikan saran kepada Dewan Komisaris kerait dengan adanya potensi benturan kepentingan Perseroan;ILA  
10. Membuat, seksaji, dan memperbarui Piagam Komite Audit.

# Wewenang Komite Audit

1. Komite Audit berwenang untuk membuatsson secara摄入, bebas, dan tidak terbatas terhadap catatan, kanyakan, dana, aset, seda sumber daya Perseroan lainnya yang Berkaitan dengan pelaksanaan tugasnya;  
2. Dalam melaksanakan wewenang (poin 1 di atas), Komite Audit wajib bekerja sama dengan karyawan, termasuk Direksi dan pihak yang menjalankan fungsi Audit Internal, manajemen risiko, dan Akuntan erkait tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Audit;ILA  
3. Melibatkan pihak independen di luar anggota Komite Audit yang diperlukan untuk membantu pelaksanaan tugasnya (jika diperlukan).

# Pengangkatan dan Pemberhentian Komite Audit

Pengangkatan dan pemberhentian anggota Komite Audit dilakukan berdasarkan keputusan Dewan Komisaris, dengan tetap mengaku pada peraturan yang berlaku untuk memastikan independensi dan keahlian dalam melaksanan tugas.

2. Reviewing the Company's compliance with laws and regulations in Capital Market sector and other laws and regulations related to the Company's activities;  
3. Providing recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding the appointment of Public Accountant based on the independency, scope of assignment, and fees;  
4. Providing independent opinions in cases of dissenting opinion between management and the Accountant regarding the services provided;  
5. Reviewing the implementation of audits by internal auditors and supervising the follow-up actions by the Board of Directors on internal audit findings;  
6. Reporting to the Board of Commissioners on various risks faced by the Company and the implementation of risk management by the Board of Directors;  
7. Reviewing and reporting to the Board of Commissioners on complaints related to the Company's accounting and financial reporting processes;  
8. Maintaining the confidentiality of documents, data, and information of the Company;  
9. Reviewing and providing recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding potential conflicts of interest within the Company; and  
10. Creating, reviewing, and updating the Audit Committee Charter.

# Audit Committee Authorities

1. The Audit Committee has the authority to have full, free, and unlimited access to records, employees, funds, assets, and other Company resources related to the implementation of its duties;  
2. In exercising its authority (point 1 above), the Audit Committee is required to cooperate with employees, including the Board of Directors and parties carrying out Internal Audit function, risk management, and Accountant related to the duties and responsibilities of the Audit Committee; and  
3. Involving independent external parties beyond the Audit Committee members when necessary to assist in carrying out its duties (if needed).

# Appointment and Dismissal of the Audit Committee

The Audit Committee members are appointed and dismissed based on the Board of Commissioners' decision, with still referring to the prevailing regulations to ensure independency and expertise in carrying out their duties.

Ketua Komite Audit hijabat oleh Tanan Herwandi Antonius, yang merupakan Komisaris Independen Perseroan. Selain itu, anggota Komite Audit terdiri dari Lanny Bambang dan Thomas Johannes Angfendy, yang memiliki kompetensi di bidang akuntansi, keuangan, dan audit sesuai dengan kebutuhan Perseroan.

Proses pengangkatan Komite Audit telah tercatat secara resmi pada tanggal 1 Agustus 2022. Seluruh anggota Komite Audit diangkat untuk menjalankan tugas sesuai dengan Piagam Komite Audit, yang menjadi panduan kerja mereka dalam mendukung fungsi pengawasan dan pengelolaan risiko. Informasi mengenai Komite Audit telah dilaporkan kepada OJK dan dimuat dalam situs web Bursa Efek Indonesia dan situs web resmi Perseroan.

# Kriteria Komite Audit

Kriteria Komite Audit telah ditentukan berdasarkan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015, yakni:

1. Memiliki integritas yang tinggi, kemampuan, pengetahun dan pengalaman yang memadai sesuai dengan latar belakang pendidikannya, seda mampuBERkomunikasi dengan baik;  
2. Salah seorang dari anggota Komite Audit memiligi latar belakang pendidikan akuntansi kepada keuangan;  
3. Memiliki pengetahunan yang@cukup untuk membraca dan memahami laporan keuangan, khususnya yang terkait dengan layanan jasa atau kegiatan usaha Perseroan, proses audit, manajemen risiko, dan peraturan perdang-undangan di bidang Pasar Modalanya peraturan perdang-undangan terkait lainnya;  
4. Wajib mematuhi kode etik Komite Audit yang ditetapkan oleh Perseroan;  
5. Bukan tersebut orang dalam Kantor Akuntan Publik, Kantor Konsultan Hukum, Kantor Jasa Penilai Publik untuk pihak lain yang memberikan jasa assurance untuk non-assurance, jasa penilai dan/atau jasa konsultasi dalam 1 (satu) tahun terakhir pada Perseroan;  
6. Bukan tersebut Karyawan Kunci Perseroan dalam 1 (satu) tahun terakhir, kecuali Komisaris Independen;  
7. Tidak mempunyai saham pada Perseroan, baik langsung maupun tidak langsung;  
8. Dalam hal anggota Komite Audit memperoleh saham Perseroan baik langsung maupun tidak langsung akibat suatu peristiwa hukum, makai saham tersebut wajib dialihkan kepada pihak lain dalam jangka waktu paling lama 6 (enam) bulan setelah diperelehnya saham tersebut;  
9. Tidak mempunyai hubungan affiliasi dengan Perseroan, Komisaris, Direksi, ataupemegang saham utama Perseroan; seksa

The Audit Committee is chaired by Tanan Herwandi Antonius, who serves as the Company's Independent Commissioner. In addition, the Audit Committee comprises Lanny Bambang and Thomas Johannes Angfendy, who possess expertise in accounting, finance, and auditing in accordance with the Company's needs.

The appointment process of the Audit Committee was officially recorded on August 1, 2022. All members were appointed to carry out their responsibilities in line with the Audit Committee Charter, which serves as their working guideline in supporting supervisory and risk management functions. Information regarding the Audit Committee has been reported to OJK and published on the Indonesia Stock Exchange website and the Company's official website.

# Audit Committee Criteria

The Audit Committee criteria have been determined based on OJK Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015, namely:

1. Have high integrity, adequate ability, knowledge and experience relating to their educational background, as well as good communication skills;  
2. At least one of the Audit Committee members has to have finance or accounting educational background;  
3. Have sufficient knowledge to read and understand financial statements, particularly those related to the Company's services or business activities, audit processes, risk management, and legislation in the Capital Market and other relevant laws and regulations;  
4. Must comply with the Audit Committee's code of conduct established by the Company;  
5. Not a person in the Public Accounting Firm, Law Firm, Public Appraisal Service or other parties providing assurance or non-assurance services, appraisal services and/or other consulting services in the last 1 (one) year for the Company;  
6. Has not been a key employee of the Company for at least 1 (one) year, except Independent Commissioner;  
7. Has no share in the Company, either directly or indirectly;  
8. In the event that a member of the Audit Committee acquires the Company's shares both directly and indirectly as a result of a legal cases, those rights to shares must be transferred to another party within a period of 6 (six) months following the share acquisition;  
9. Has no affiliation with the Company, the Board of Commissioner, the Board of Directors, or main shareholders of the Company; and

10. Tidak memiliki hubungan usaha, baik langsung maupun tidak langsung yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha Perseroan.

Komposisi Komite Audit Perseroan per 31 Desember 2024 diuraikan sebagai berikut:

10. Does not have a business relationship, either directly or indirectly related to the Company's business activities.

# Independensi Komite Audit

Ketua dan seluruh anggota Komite Audit telah menyatakapan independen serta tetap Berkomitmen menjaga objektivitas dan profesionalisme dalam penyampaian laporan kepada Dewan Komisaris. Hal ini guna memberikan kepercayaan kepada pemangku kepentingan bahwa pengawasan yang dilakukan tanpa pengaruh kepentingan tertentu. Adapun kriteria independensi yang dipatuhi oleh Komite Audit, yaitu:

1. Anggota Komite Audit bukan merupakan pejabat eksekutif Kantor Akuntan Publik yang memberikan jasa audit dan/atau jasa non-audit kepada Perseroan dalam 6 (enam) bulan terakhir sebelum penunjukanya sebagai anggota Komite Audit.  
2. Anggota Komite Audit juga tidak memiliki hubungan keuangan, tepengurusan, tepemilikan saham dan/atau hubungan keluarga dengan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi dan/atau pemegang saham pengendali atau hubungan dengan Perseroan, yang dapat memengaruhi independensi anggota.

# Rapat Komite Audit

# Kebijakan

Piagam Komite Audit memberi ketetapan(OP) mengenai pelaksanaan Rapat Komite Audit dengan ketentuan-ketentuan sebagai berikut:

1. RapatKomite Auditwajib diadakan sekurang-kurangnya 3 (tiga) kali dalam 1 (satu) tahun;  
2. Rapat dipimpin oleh Ketua Komite Audit untuk Anggota Komite Audit yang paling senior, apabila Ketua Komite Audit berhalangan hadir;  
3. Rapat Komite Audit sekurang-kurangnya dihadiri oleh 2/3 (dua per tiga) dari jumlah anggota dan dapat dihadiri oleh Dewan Komisaris;  
4. Direksi kepada Kepala Audit Internal dapat diundang untuk hadir pada Rapat Komite Audit bila dipandang perlu;  
5. Keputusan rapat diambil atas persetujuan lebih dari 1/2 (satu per dua) jumlah anggota Komite Audit yang hadir;  
6. Rapat Komite Audit sekurang-kurangnya membricarakan: a. Kegiatan-kegiatan yang perlu dilakukan Komite Audit dalam rangka melaksanakan tugas dan fungsinya;服务于 b. Hasil penelaahan atas informasi yang telah diterima Komite Audit;  
7. Hasil-hasil rapat Komite Audit dituangkan dalam suatu risalah rapat, termasuk apabila terdapat perbedaan pendapat (dissenting opinions), yang ditandatangani oleh seluruh anggota Komite Audit yang hadir dan disampaikan kepada Dewan Komisaris.

# Independence of Audit Committee

The Chairman and all Audit Committee members have declared their independence and are committed to maintaining objectivity and professionalism when submitting reports to the Board of Commissioners. This is to provide confidence to stakeholders that the supervision carried out is without the influence of certain interests. The independence criteria adhered to by the Audit Committee are:

1. The members of Audit Committee are not executive official in Public Accounting Firm that render audit services and/or non-audit services to the Company in the last 6 (six) months prior to their appointment as members of the Audit Committee.  
2. The members of Audit Committee also do not have financial, management, share ownership, and/or family relationships with the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, and/or controlling shareholders or any relations with the Company that may affect their independency.

# Audit Committee's Meetings

# Policy

The Audit Committee Charter stipulates the implementation of Audit Committee's Meetings with the following provisions:

1. The Audit Committee must hold at least 3 (three) meetings in 1 (one) year;  
2. The meeting is led by Chairman of the Audit Committee. Should he/she be unable to attend a meeting, the most senior Audit Committee's member will lead the meeting;  
3. The Audit Committee's meeting must be attended by at least 2/3 (two thirds) of the committee's members and may be attended by Board of Commissioners' members;  
4. The Board of Directors or the Head of Internal Audit may be invited to attend Audit Committee's meetings if deemed necessary;  
5. Decisions made by the committee must be approved by more than  $1/2$  (half) the number of attending Audit Committee's members;  
6. The Audit Committee's meeting must at least discuss: a. Activities needed to be taken by the Audit Committee in order to carry out its duties and functions; and b. Results of the review of the information has been received by the Audit Committee;  
7. The Audit Committee's meeting results are recorded in the minutes of the meeting, including if there are dissenting opinions, which are signed by all members of the Audit Committee present and submitted to the Board of Commissioners.

Tugas utamanya mencakup penyelenggaraan RUPS, pengelolaan dokumentasi, memastikan kepadahan terhadap regulasi, serta menjaga transparansi informasi dan mendukung strategi komunikasi Perseroan sesuai ketentuan hukum,seperti pada POJK No.35/POJK.04/2014.

Sekretaris Perusahaan memiliki tanggung jawab yang luas dalam mengelola administrasi Perseroan, termasuk memperkuat citra Perseroan, membrina hubungan dengan lembaga-lembaga terkait, memastikan Perseroan mematuhi peraturan pasar modal, seda melaksanakan berbagai fungsi kesekretariatan yang meliputi pengelolaan sumber daya manusia, kepadahan hukum, implementasi governansi korporat, seda tanggung jawab sosial perusahaan (CSR).

# Dasar Hukum

Perseroan menunjuk Tulus Santoso sebagai Sekretaris Perusahaan sejak tahun 2012. Penunjukan ini dilakukan berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Direksi No. 085/CDCCKC/h/V/12-CTRA, danASA jabatnya berlaku tingga saat ini. Tulus Santoso menjadi sebagai Sekretaris Perusahaan sekalis Gurus Direktur Perseroan, tanpa merangkap jabatan di perusahaan lain. Dengan berbagai pengalaman, beliau menjalankan kedu peran secara optimal demi kepentingan terbaik Perseroan dan pemangku kepentingan.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan

Mengacu kepada Anggaran Dasar Perseroan dan Peraturan OJK No. 35/POJK.04/2014, tugas dan tanggung jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan mencakup:

1. Memberikan informasi kepada publik khususnya pemegang saham mengenai kondisi Perseroan termasuk kegiatan ataupun transaksi material yang dapat memengaruhi kondisi Perseroan;  
2. Mengikuti perkembangan相对较 modal, khususnya peraturan-peraturan terkini yang berlaku di相对较 modal;  
3. Bertindak tersebut mediator antara Perseroan dengan regulator, investor dan publikserta memastikan kepadahan Perseroan terhadap ketentuan dari para regulator;

The Corporate Secretary plays a key role in supporting the implementation of good corporate governance by ensuring effective communication between management, the Board of Commissioners, shareholders, and external stakeholders. The main duties include organizing the GMS, managing documentation, ensuring regulatory compliance, maintaining information transparency, and supporting the Company's communication strategy in accordance with legal provisions, such as POJK No. 35/POJK.04/2014.

The Corporate Secretary holds broad responsibilities in managing the Company's administration, including strengthening the Company's image, fostering relationships with relevant institutions, ensuring compliance with capital market regulations, and carrying out various secretarial functions covering human resources management, legal compliance, corporate governance implementation, and corporate social responsibility (CSR).

# Legal Basis

The Company appointed Tulus Santoso as the Corporate Secretary in 2012. This appointment was made based on the Board of Directors' Decision No. 085/CDCCKC/h/V/12-CTRA, and his term remains effective to this day. Tulus Santoso serves as the Corporate Secretary as well as a Director of the Company, without holding concurrent positions in other companies. With his extensive experience, he performs both roles optimally in the best interest of the Company and its stakeholders.

# Duties and Responsibilities of Corporate Secretary

According to the Company's Articles of Association and OJK Regulation No. 35/POJK.04/2014, the duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary include:

1. Providing information for public, especially the shareholders related to the Company's condition including each activity or material transaction that may affect the Company's condition;  
2. Keep abreast of the capital market, specifically the updated prevailing capital market regulations;  
3. Acting as the liaison of the Company and regulators, investors and public as well as ensuring the Company to comply with the regulator's rules;

4. Memberikan masukan kepada Direksi Perseroan dalam hal kepadauhan terhadap peraturan perundangan yang berlaku;  
5. Mendukung Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dalam hal pengawasan terhadap prerapan prinsip governansi korporat di Perseroan yang sesuai dengan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku meliputi:

a. Keterbukaan informasi kepada mayarakat, termasuk ketersediaan informasi pada Situs Web Perseroan;  
b. Penyampaian laporan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan dan Bursa Efek Indonesia tepat waktu;  
c. Penyelenggaraan dan dokumentasi Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham;  
d. Penyelenggaraan dan dokumentasi rapat Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris;{serta

e. Pelaksanaan program orientasi bagi Direksi dan/ atau Dewan Komisaris.

6. Membuat laporan bergala mengenai pelaksanaan fungsi Sekretaris Perusahaan kepada Direksi dan ditembuskan kepada Dewan Komisaris sedikitnya sekali dalam setahun; serta  
7. Memelihara kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi kecuali dalam rangka memenuhi kewajiban sesuai dengan peraturan perundang-undangan oleh ditentukan lain dalam peraturan perundang-undangan.

4. Providing recommendation to the Board of Directors in terms of compliance with the prevailing rules and regulations;  
5. Assisting the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners in supervising the GCG implementation of the Company in accordance with the prevailing rules and regulations covering:

a. Information disclosure to the public including the information availability on website;  
b. Submitting reports to Financial Services Authority and Indonesia Stock Exchange in timely manner;  
c. Organizing and documenting the General Meeting of Shareholders;  
d. Organizing and documenting Meetings of the Board of Directors and/or the Board of Commissioners; and  
e. Implementing orientation program for the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners.

6. Preparing periodical reports at least once a year concerning the Corporate Secretary's function to the Board of Directors and carbon copied to the Board of Commissioners; and  
7. Maintaining the confidentiality of documents, data, and information, in exception for fulfilling the obligation in accordance with the rules or otherwise stated in regulation.

# Implementation of Corporate Secretary's Duties

The Corporate Secretary has conducted various tasks and activities in 2024 with the following details:

1. Managing the schedule and coordination of Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners meetings, ensuring smooth communication and efficient decision-making within the organization;  
2. Providing transparent information to the public, particularly to shareholders, regarding the Company's condition, including updates on activities or material transactions that may impact the Company's performance and stability; and

As an independent function, Internal Audit is responsible for conducting objective assessments of the Company's internal control system, operational process, and compliance with applicable regulations. Internal Audit offers improvement recommendations to ensure that existing risks are minimized, and the Company's objectives are optimally achieved.

# Legal Basis

The legal basis for Internal Audit is stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 56/POJK.04/2015, the Articles of Association, the 2021 PUGKI, and the Internal Audit Charter. These regulations require the Company to establish an Internal Audit function that provides independent oversight of the Company's operations. The Board of Commissioners, through the Audit Committee, supervises the Internal Audit function to ensure its role in supporting the achievement of the Company's objectives through the evaluation and enhancement of the effectiveness of risk management, internal control, and corporate governance.

# Piagam Audit Internal

Piagam Audit Internal merupakan dokumen resmi yang menjadi pedoman dalam pelaksanaan fungsi audit internal, mengatur tugas, tanggung jawab, wewenang,serta kode etik yang telah ditetapkan oleh asosiasi Audit Internal atau kode etik Audit Internal yang lazim berlaku secara internasional. Piagam ini ditetapkan oleh Direksi dan disetuju'i oleh Dewan Komisaris pada 4 Desember 2009. Dengan adanya piagam ini, Audit Internal memiligi landasan hukum yang jelas untuk makukan pengawasan, evaluasi, dan memberikan rekomendasi yang konstruktif guna memastikan efektivitas pengendalian internal, pengelolaan risiko, dan kepadauhan terhadap peraturanserta kebijakan Perseroan.

Piagam Audit Internal mencakup aspek-aspek terkait Audit Internal dengan rincian sebagai berikut:

1. Misi Audit Internal;  
2. Lingkup Tugas Audit Internal;  
3. Struktur dan Kedudukan Audit Internal;  
4. Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab;  
5. Wewenang;  
6. Kode Etik; serta  
7. Pertanggungjawaban.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Audit Internal

1. Menyusun dan melaksanakan Rencana Audit Internal Tahunan;  
2. Menguji dan mangevaluasi pelaksanaan pengendalian internal dan systemd manajemen risiko seksui dengan kebijakan Perseroan;  
3. Melakukan pemeriksaan dan penilaian atas efisiensi dan efektivitas di bidang keuangan, akuntansi, operasional, sumber daya manusia, pemasaran, tekologi informasi, dan kegiatan lainnya;  
4. Memberikan saran perbaikan dan informasi yang objektif inginatan yang diperiksa pada semua tingkatan manajemen;  
5. Membuat laporan tersebut audit dan mencampaikan laporan tersebut kepada Direktur Utama dan Dewan Komisaris;

7. Bekerja sama dengan Komite Audit;  
8. Menyusun program untuk mengevaluasi mutu kegiatan Audit Internal yang dilakukannya; seda  
9. Melakukan pemeriksaan khusus apabila diperlukan.

# Internal Audit Charter

The Internal Audit Charter is an official document that serves as a guideline for the implementation of the internal audit function. It outlines the duties, responsibilities, authorities, and code of conduct established by the Internal Audit association or those commonly accepted internationally. The Charter was established by the Board of Directors and approved by the Board of Commissioners on December 4, 2009. With this Charter in place, Internal Audit is provided with a clear legal foundation to carry out oversight, evaluation, and provide constructive recommendations to ensure the effectiveness of internal control, risk management, and compliance with the Company's regulations and policies.

The Internal Audit Charter covers aspects related to Internal Audit with the following details:

1. Internal Audit Mission;  
2. Scope of Internal Audit Duties;  
3. Structure and Position of Internal Audit;  
4. Duties and Responsibilities;  
5. Authority;  
6. Code of Conduct; and  
7. Accountability.

# Internal Audit Duties and Responsibilities

1. Developing and implementing the Annual Internal Audit Plan;  
2. Verifying and evaluating the implementation of internal control and risk management system with regard to the Company's policies;  
3. Auditing and assessing the efficiency and effectiveness of finance, accounting, operations, human resources, marketing, information technology, and other activities;  
4. Providing recommendations for improvements and objective information related to the various audited activities at all levels of management;  
5. Preparing a report on audit results and submit the report to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners;  
6. Monitoring, analyzing, and reporting the implementation of improvements follow-up that have been recommended;  
7. Working closely with the Audit Committee;  
8. Developing a program to evaluate the quality of the implemented Internal audit activities; and  
9. Carrying out special audit when deemed necessary.

# Wewenang Audit Internal

1. Mengakses Seluruh informasi yang relevant pentang perusahaan terkait dengan tugas dan fungsinya;  
2. Melakukan komunikasi secara langsung dengan Direksi, Dewan Komisaris, dan/atau Komite Audit,serta anggota dari Direksi, Dewan Komisaris, dan/atau Komite Audit;  
3. Mengadakan rapat secara bergala dan insidential dengan Direksi, Dewan Komisaris, dan/atau Komite Audit;  
4. Melakukan koordinasi kegiatan audit dengan kegiatan auditor eksternal;{serta  
5. Mengalokasikan sumber daya manusia, menentukan frekuensi, memilih subyek, menentukan cakupan tugas, dan menerapkan teknik yang dibutuhkan untuk mencapai sasan audit.

Ruang lingkup tugas Audit Internal mencakup penilaian yang objektif atas operasional, sistem, dan proses bisnis untuk memastikan telah Perseroan berjalan seksuai dengan kebjakan dan standar yang telah ditetapkan.

Adapun ruang lingkup tugas Audit Internal Perseroan sesuai ketentuan peraturan yang berlaku seksagai berikut:

1. Risiko telah@cukup diidentifikasi dan dikelola;  
2. Interaksi dengan para pihak pengelola berlangsung sesuai sebagai mestianya;  
3. Informasi penting keuangan, managerial, dan operasional adalah akurat, andal, dan tepat waktu;  
4. Tindakan karyawan sesuai dengan kebjakan, standar, prosedur, hukum, dan peraturan yang berlaku;  
5. Sumber daya diperoleh secara ekonomis, digunakan secara efisien dan@cukup terlindungi;  
6. Program, rencana, dan sasaran dapat dicapai;  
7. Kualitas dan perbaikan yang berkesinambungan terpelihara di dalam proses pengendalian Perseroan; seda  
8. Peraturan dan undang-undang penting yang berpengaruh terhadap Perseroan telah diketahui dan diperhatikan secara layak.

Tugas Audit Internal juga erat kaitannya dengan pemecahan masalah atas personałan manajemen dan operational yang dihadapi Perseroan. Dengan begitu, Audit Internal Perseroan diharapkan mampu melakukan perbaikan atas pengendalian, manajemen, profitabilitas dan citra Perseroan yang ditemukan selama proses audit.

# Internal Audit Authorities

1. Access to all relevant information about the company related to the duties and functions;  
2. Communicate directly with the Board of Directors, Board of Commissioners, and/or the Audit Committee and members of the Board of Directors, Board of Commissioners, and/or the Audit Committee;  
3. Meeting on a regular basis and incidental with the Board of Directors, Board of Commissioners, and/or the Audit Committee;  
4. Coordinate audit activities with the external auditor; and  
5. Allocate human resources, determine frequency, select subjects, determine scope of responsibility and apply the techniques required to achieve the audit objectives.

# Scope of Work

The scope of Internal Audit duties includes objective assessments of operations, systems, and business processes to ensure that the Company operates in accordance with established policies and standards.

The scope of the Company's Internal Audit duties following applicable regulations is as follows:

1. Risks have been reasonably identified and managed;  
2. Interactions with the manager taking place as it should be;  
3. Important information of financial, managerial, and operational is accurate, reliable, and punctual;  
4. Employees' actions are aligned with prevailing policies, standards, procedures, laws, and regulations;  
5. Resources acquired economically, used efficiently, and adequately protected;  
6. Program, plans, and goals are able to achieve;  
7. Quality and continuous improvement preserved within the control of the Company; and  
8. Prominent regulations and legislation which influence the Company has been known and are properly addressed.

Internal Audit duties are also closely related to problem-solving regarding management and operational issues the Company faces. In this way, the Company's Internal Audit is expected to improve the control, management, profitability, and image of the Company found during the audit process.

This approach ensures that the Company is able to manage uncertainty in a measured manner, whether through prevention, impact reduction, or risk transfer.

In practice, risk management covers various aspects, such as operational, financial, legal, reputational risks,

reputasi, hingga risiko eksternal,seperti perubahan regulasi dan kondisiasar. Setiapjenis risiko membutuhkan pendekatan dan strategi mitigasi yang diseuikan dengan karakteristiknya. # Manajemen Risiko yang Diterapkan dalam Perusahaan

# Applied Risk Management in the Company

The Company implements an Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) system as the primary approach to managing risks in an integrated and comprehensive manner across all operational lines. Regular updates to the risk management framework are carried out to ensure its effectiveness and relevance, based on international standards such as ISO 31000 on Risk Management. This system is designed to proactively identify, assess, and mitigate risks, thus supporting the achievement of the Company's strategic objectives. Through the implementation of ERM, the Company also ensures that decision-making is conducted with consideration of the potential risks and opportunities at hand.

The Company has categorized frequently encountered risks into 2 (two) main categories:

1. Strategic Risk (reputation, regulatory compliance, financial, etc.); and  
2. Operational Risk (HR, information technology, business processes, SOPs, etc).

The Company adopts a comprehensive risk analysis approach, starting with a bottom-up method conducted by each business unit to identify potential risks at the operational level. The results of this analysis are then reviewed using a top-down approach by the Board of Directors to ensure alignment with the Company's strategic vision. This entire analysis process is regularly monitored to ensure that each risk is accurately identified and that the mitigation measures implemented provide optimal protection for business continuity.

Furthermore, the Company focuses on developing risk management based on Information Technology (IT). This IT-based system is designed to facilitate monitoring, reporting, and decision-making processes that are faster and data-driven. By utilizing advanced technology, the Company is able to integrate risk information from various business lines into a centralized platform, minimizing the potential for errors and improving the response to changes in risk dynamics in real-time.

Untuk menjalankan pengarapan system manajemen risiko, Perseroan telah mementuk Unit Manajemen Risiko (UMR) di setiap unit bisnis dengan rincian tugas sebagai berikut:

1. Membantu pihak manajemen dalam membrangun kerangka kerja ERM yang sesuai dengan struktur organisasi dan kebutuhan masing-masing unit bisnis;  
2. Berperan penting dalam aktivukan konsolidasi dan pelaporan risiko utama yang diidentifikasi di berbagai unit bisnis kepada Direksi;  
3. Mengomunikasikan risiko strategis yang menjadi perhatian Direksi kepada seluruh unit bisnis;{serta  
4. Bertindak-Sebagai facilitator dalam pengelolaan risiko dalam memberikan masukan atas pengelolaan risiko, pemantuan profil risiko, dan peninjauan efektivitas rencana mitigasi risiko yang disusun oleh setiap unit bisnis.

# Upaya Mitigasi Risiko

Perseroan memiliki komitmen untuk mengurangi dan menghilangkan dampak risiko. Untuk itu, Perseroan terus menganalisis risiko-risiko yang ada dan menentukan langkah-langkah untuk mengurangi risiko tersebut. Perseroan juga memantau realisasi upaya mitigasi risiko tersebut setiap 3 (tiga) bulan. Pemantauan ini dilakukan untuk mengukur nilai risiko residual, yaitu risiko yang masih ada setelah upaya mitigasi dilakukan.

# Evaluasi Efektivitas Implementasi Manajemen Risiko

Dewan Komisaris memiliki tugas untuk pengawasi jalannya manajemen risiko Perseroan secara teratur. Evaluasi manajemen risiko ini bertujuan agar dapat menilai kualitas rancangan dan pelaksanaan proses manajemen risiko, pengawasan tingkat risiko, seksa ketepatan pengambilan keputusan oleh Direksi.

Hasil evaluasi implementasi manajemen risiko digunakan untuk mengidentifikasi area yang dapat ditingkatkan, Seeinga Dewan Komisaris dapat memastikan Bahwa kebjakan yang ada sesuai dengan tujuan, sasaran, strategi, seda toleransi risiko yang telah ditentukan. Agar efektivitas tetap terjaga, kebjakan ini ditinjau secara berkala.

# Pernyataan Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris atas Kecukupan Sistem Manajemen Risiko

Dewan Komisaris menjadikahanya kebujakan manajemen risiko Perseroan sepanjang tahun 2024 telah selaras dengan tujuan, strategi, seda tingkat toleransi risiko yang ditetapkan. Kebijakan tersebut dinilai mampu memberikan peringatan dini terhadap risiko material serta memastikan kepada potensi dan dampak risiko telah dianalisis dengan baik dan disertai strategi mitigasi yang memadai.

Dewan Komisaris menjadi管理者 risiko Perseroan pada tahun 2024 telah berjalan sesuai prosedur, memadai, dan sejalan dengan ketentuan peraturan yang berlaku. Berdasarkan laporan realisasi mitigasi, tidak terdapat risiko signifikan yang berdampak terhadap Perseroan sepanjang tahun 2024. Risiko minor dan insiden yang muncul telah ditangani secara cepat dan efektif.

# Risk Mitigation Efforts

The Company is committed to minimizing and mitigating risk. As such, the Company constantly analyzes potential risks and implements measures to reduce them. Every 3 (three) months, the Company also keeps an eye on the success of risk mitigation measures. The purpose of this monitoring is to calculate the residual risk value or the risk that remains after mitigating actions have been taken.

# Evaluation of Effectiveness of Risk Management Implementation

The Board of Commissioners is tasked with regularly overseeing the Company's risk management processes. This risk management evaluation aims to assess the quality of the design and implementation of risk management processes, monitor risk levels, and evaluate the accuracy of decisions made by the Board of Directors.

The results of the risk management implementation evaluation are used to identify areas for improvement, enabling the Board of Commissioners to ensure that existing policies align with the Company's goals, objectives, strategies, and defined risk tolerance. To maintain effectiveness, these policies are reviewed periodically.

# Statement of the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners on the Adequacy of Risk Management System

The Board of Commissioners assessed that the Company's risk management policies throughout 2024 were aligned with the established objectives, strategies, and risk tolerance levels. These policies were deemed effective in providing early warnings of material risks and ensuring that potential risks and their impacts were thoroughly analyzed and accompanied by adequate mitigation strategies.

The Board of Commissioners also concluded that the implementation of the Company's risk management in 2024 was conducted in accordance with procedures, was adequate, and complied with applicable regulations. Based on the mitigation realization report, there were no significant risks that affected the Company throughout 2024. Minor risks and incidents that occurred were handled promptly and effectively.

# Sistem Pengendalian Internal

# Internal Control System

Sistem pengendalian internal merupakan suatu rangkaian kebikan, prosedur, dan aktivitas yang dirancang untuk memastikan bahwa tujuan Perseroan tercapai secara efisien dan efektif, seda untuk melindungi aset Perseroan dari risiko yang tidak diinginkan. Sistem ini mencakup pengawasan terhadap kegiatan keuangan dan operational.

# Sistem Pengendalian Keuangan dan Operational

Perseroan menerapkan systemd pengendalian internal guna,Thengatdien,aspek keuang,serta operasional,termasuk memastikan keandalan pelaporan keuang sesuai prinsip akuntansi yang berlaku. Penerapan system ini melibatkan peran aktif Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, dan manajemen.Dewan Komisaris turut mengawasi efektivitasystem pengendalian internal dan memberikan arahan kepada Direksi, khususnya terkait pelaporan keuang dan pengelolaan risiko.

# Kesesuaian Sistem Pengendalian Internal dengan COSO (Internal Control Framework)

Perseroan memastikan Bahwa systemd pengendalian internal yang diterapkan telah seksuai dengan kerangka kerja COSO untuk mendukung governansi korporat. Sistem ini dirancang berdasarkan 5 (lima) komponen utama COSO, yaitu lingkungan pengendalian, penilaian risiko, aktivitas pengendalian, informasi dan komunikasi, seda pemantuaan. Sistem ini dirancang untuk mendukung governansi korporat dan menjaga keberlanjutan bisnis melalui pengendalian yang efektif dan terukur.

Perseroan menciplementasikan COSO melalui 5 (lima) komponen inti yang dapat bersinergi dan mendukung tujuan bisnis Perseroan, di antaranya:

# 1. Control Environment

Komponen ini bertindak sebagai pengendalian Internal yang menyediakan arahan bagi Perseroan dan memberikan pengaruh akan kesadaran pengendalian dari individu yang ada di dalam Perseroan. Adapun faktor-faktor yang memengaruh Control Environment antara lainseperti integritas dan nilai etik, komitmen terhadap kompetensi, Direksi dan Komite Audit, gaya manajemen dan gaya operasi, struktur organasil, pemberian wewenang dan tanggung jawab, praktik, serta kebujanan SDM.

The internal control system is a set of policies, procedures, and activities designed to ensure that the Company's objectives are achieved efficiently and effectively, while safeguarding the Company's assets from undesirable risks. This system includes both financial and operational controls.

# Financial and Operational Control System

The Company implements an internal control system to manage and monitor financial and operational aspects, including ensuring the reliability of financial reporting in accordance with applicable accounting principles. The implementation of this system involves the active roles of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, and management. The Board of Commissioners also supervises the effectiveness of the internal control system and provides guidance to the Board of Directors, particularly regarding financial reporting and risk management.

# Conformity of Internal Control System with COSO (Internal Control Framework)

The Company ensures that the internal control system implemented is aligned with the COSO framework to support corporate governance. This system is built upon the five core components of COSO: control environment, risk assessment, control activities, information and communication, and monitoring. It is designed to reinforce good governance and sustain business continuity through effective and measurable controls.

The Company implements COSO through 5 (five) core components to synergize and support the Company's business objectives, among others:

# 1. Control Environment

This component serves as the foundation of Internal Control, providing direction for the Company and influencing the control awareness of individuals within the organization. Factors that affect the Control Environment include integrity and ethical values, commitment to competence, the Board of Directors and Audit Committee, management and operational style, organizational structure, delegation of authority and responsibilities, practices, and HR policies.

# 2. Monitoring

Merupakan suatu kegiatan yang berlangsung secara berkelanjutan, evaluasi secara terpisah oleh kombiniasi dari keduanya. Proses ini dilakukan untuk menentukan kualitas kinerja pengendalian internal yang mencaku penentuan desain dan operasi pengendalian kepada waktu serta pengambilan tindakan perbaikan. Dalam hal ini, pemantauan terhadap kegiatan Perseroan dilakukan oleh Audit Internal.

# 3. Risk Assessment

Membentuk suatu fondasi untuk mengidentifikasi pengelolaan risiko dan makukan analisis risiko yang relevant.

# 4. Control Activities

Memberikan suatu tingkat keyakinan akan adanya tindakan yang diperlukan dalam rangka menanggulangi risiko.

# 5. Information and Communication

Menyediakan informasi yang relevant dalam pelaporan keuangan yang meliputi system akuntansi yang berisi metode untuk makukan identifikasi, penggabungan, analisis, klasifikasi, pencatatan dan pelaporan transaksi, seda menjaga akuntabilitas aset dan liabilitas. Informasi terkait harus diidentifikasi, terdeskripsi dan terkomunikasi dalam;bentuk dan jangka waktu yang memungkankan tiap individu melaksanakan tanggung jawabnya.

# Evaluasi atas Efektivitas Sistem Pengendalian Internal

Perseroan mangevaluasi efektivitasystempengendalian internalmelaluiInternalAuditgunamemastikanbawhasystemberjalan sesuai dengantujuan yang ditetapkan.Hasil evaluasi ini memberikan keyakinan kepada Direksi, pemegang saham,dan pemangku kepentingan.Temuandankrekomendasi perbaikan disampaikan melalui Laporan Hasil Audit kepada Direktur Utama dan Dewan Komisaris.

Direksi secara Berkala seksutuk evaluasi terhadap efektivitasystempengelolaanrisiko,pengendalian internal,governansi,dan kepadahan.Direksi jugamemastikan Bahwa Perseroan selalu mengikuti perkembangan peraturan perundang-undangan,baik yang bersifat industri maupun umum. Untuk mendukung hal tersebut,Perseroan telah memiliki system yang memastikan kepadahan terhadap regulasi eksternal maupun kebujakan internal.

# 2. Monitoring

This refers to ongoing activities, separate evaluations, or a combination of both. The process is conducted to determine the quality of internal control performance, including the timely assessment of control design and operation, as well as the implementation of corrective actions. In this regard, the Company's activities are monitored by Internal Audit.

# 3. Risk Assessment

This forms a foundation for identifying and managing risks and conducting relevant risk analyses.

# 4. Control Activities

These provide a level of assurance that necessary actions will be taken to address risks.

# 5. Information and Communication

This involves providing relevant information for financial reporting, including an accounting system that consists of methods for identifying, combining, analyzing, classifying, recording, and reporting transactions, as well as maintaining accountability of assets and liabilities. Relevant information must be identified, described, and communicated in a format and timeframe that enables individuals to fulfill their responsibilities.

# Evaluation on the Effectiveness of Internal Control System

The Company evaluates the effectiveness of the internal control system through Internal Audit to ensure that the system operates in accordance with its established objectives. The results of this evaluation provide assurance to the Board of Directors, shareholders, and stakeholders. Findings and improvement recommendations are submitted through the Audit Report to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners.

The Board of Directors periodically evaluates the effectiveness of risk management, internal control, governance, and compliance systems. The Board of Directors also ensures that the Company consistently updates with the development in laws and regulations, both industry-specific and general. To support this, the Company has implemented a system that ensures compliance with both external regulations and internal policies.

# Pernyataan Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris atas Kecukupan Sistem Pengendalian Internal

Berdasarkan evaluasi Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris melalui Komite Audit, sistem pengendalian internal Perseroan pada tahun 2024 dinilai sudah memadai. Hal ini tercermin dari hasil rapat Berkala Komite Audit yang memebahas temuan auditanya tindak lanjut manajemen terhadap kelemahan kontral ata pelanggaran prosedur, guna memastikan kepada tran terhadap ketentuan yang berlaku ke depannya.

# Statement of the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners on the Adequacy of Internal Control System

Based on evaluations conducted by the Board of Directors and/or the Board of Commissioners through the Audit Committee, the Company's internal control system in 2024 was considered adequate. This was reflected in the regular meetings of the Audit Committee, which reviewed audit findings and management's follow-up actions on control weaknesses or procedural violations to ensure future compliance with applicable regulations.

# Akuntan Publik

Public Accountant

Penunjukan Kantor Akuntan Publik (KAP) oleh Perseroan dilakukan dengan mematuhi ketentuan yang tertuang dalam Peraturan OJK No. 13/POJK.03/2017tentang Penggunaan Jasa Akuntan Publik dan Kantor Akuntan Publik dalam Kegiatan Jasa Keuangan Pasal 13 ayat 1 dan 2, Anggaran Dasar Perseroan Pasal 31 ayat 7, serta Keputusan RUPS Tahunan. Ketentuan ini memastikan telah probesenunjukan dilakukan secara transparan dan akuntabel, dengan mempertimbangkan profesalisme dan independensi Akuntan Publik{serta KAP yang ditunjuk.

Pada tahun buku 2024, Perseroan menunjuk Kantor Akuntan Publik Liana Ramon Xenia & Rekan, ada Akuntan Publik Kasman untuk melaksanakan audit atas laporan keuangan Perseroan. Penunjukan ini dilakukan untuk memastikan kepada laporan keuangan disusun sesuai dengan standar akuntansi keuangan yang berlaku umum di Indonesia dan mencerminkan kondisi keuangan Perseroan secara wajar. Dalam proses audit, KAP yang ditunjuk akan bekerja secara independen dan objektif guna memberikan keyakinan kepada laporan keuangan bebas dari salah saji material.

The Public Accounting Firm (KAP) is appointed by the Company in compliance with the provisions stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 13/POJK.03/2017 on the Use of Public Accountants and Public Accounting Firms in Financial Services Activities, Article 13 paragraphs 1 and 2, Article 31 paragraph 7 of the Company's Articles of Association, and the Annual GMS resolutions. These provisions ensure that the appointment process is conducted transparently and accountably, considering the professionalism and independence of the appointed Public Accountant and Public Accounting Firm.

For the 2024 fiscal year, the Company appointed Public Accounting Firm Liana Ramon Xenia & Partners, with Public Accountant Kasman, to audit the Company's Financial Statements. This appointment was made to ensure that the Financial Statements are prepared in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles in Indonesia and fairly reflect the Company's financial condition. During the audit process, the appointed Public Accounting Firm will work independently and objectively to provide assurance that the Financial Statements are free from material misstatements.

Penunjukan KAP ini merupakan bagian dari komitmen Perseroan untuk menerapkan prinsip governansi korporat, khususnya dalam aspek transparansi dan akuntabilitas keuangan. Hasil audit yang dilakukan oleh KAP akan dilaporkan kepada RUPS dan pemangku kelentingan lainnya sebagai;bentuk pertanggungjawaban Perseroan atas pengelolaan keuangan. Dengan demikian, Perseroan dapat terus menjaga kepercayaan para pemegang saham dan masyarakat luas.

# Kode Etik

# Code of Conduct

Kode Etik atau Kode Tata Laku berfungsi sebagai panduan bagiSeluruh insan Perseroan dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawab mereka secara optimal dan profesional. Kode Etik ini dirancang untuk memastikan Bahwa setiap karyawan, mulai dari pimpinan hingga staft, memiliki pedoman yang jelas mengenai perilaku yang diharapkan dalam berbagai situasi. Dengan mematuhi Kode Etik, diharapkan setiap individu dapat berkontribusi positif terhadap terciptanya lingkungan kerja yangproduk difan harmonis, sekalisus menjaga reputasi Perseroan di mata pemangku kepentingan.

Filosofi yang terkandung dalam Kode Etik ini mencakup prinsip-prinsip dasarseperti integritas, kerja sama, dan peran serta, yang diterapkan untuk menciptakan budaya perusahaan yang sehata n saling mendukung. Kode Etik juga mengaturtentang sikap profesional, tanggung jawab sosial, dan etika dalam berinteraksi dengan kolega, mitra bisnis, serta masyarakat.

The appointment of Public Accounting Firm is part of the Company's commitment to implementing good corporate governance principles, particularly in the areas of financial transparency and accountability. The results of audit conducted by Public Accounting Firm will be reported to the GMS and other stakeholders as a form of the Company's accountability in financial management. As such, the Company continues to uphold the trust of its shareholders and the general public.

The Code of Ethics or Code of Conduct serves as a guide for all members of the Company in carrying out their duties and responsibilities optimally and professionally. This Code is designed to ensure that every employee, from management to staff, has a clear reference regarding the expected behavior in various situations. By adhering to the Code of Conduct, each individual is expected to contribute positively to the creation of a productive and harmonious work environment, while also maintaining the Company's reputation in the eyes of stakeholders.

The philosophy embedded in this Code of Conduct encompasses fundamental principles such as integrity, collaboration, and participation, which are applied to foster a healthy and supportive corporate culture. The Code of Conduct also regulates professional conduct, social responsibility, and ethics in interactions with colleagues, business partners, and the community.

# Integritas

Menjunjung tinggi kejujuran, etika, dan moral dalam bekerja untuk menciptakan iklim bekerja yang kondusif dan mengoptimalkan Corporate Value bagi Stakeholder seksuai dengan Visi - Misi Perusahaan.

To uphold honesty, ethics, and morals to create a conducive working climate and optimize Corporate Value for Stakeholders following the Company's Vision - Mission.

Cooperation

Bersemangat untuk saling menghormati, menghargai dalam menjalankan tugas dan saling memberikan bantuan untuk mendukung tercapainya Produktivitas yang tinggi sesuai tujuan Perseroan.

Be passionate about respecting each other, valuing each other in carrying out duties, and providing mutual assistance to support the achievement of high productivity following the Company's goals.

# Peran Serta  
Participation

Seluruh Pengurus dan Karyawan berperan serta dan Berkontribusi menghasilan yang terbaik dalam tugas dan tanggung jawabnya untuk mencapai tujuan Perseroan.

All Management and Employees participate and contribute to produce the best in their duties and responsibilities to achieve the Company's goals.

Perseroan secara konsisten melaksanakan sosialisasi Kode Etik kepada seluruh karyawan, yang dimulai-Sejak proses onboarding dan terus dilanjutkan selema masa kerja karyawan. Langkah ini bertujuan untuk memastikan setiap karyawan memahami dan menginternalisasi nilai-nilai seda peraturan yang berlaku di lingkungan Perseroan, Seeingga mampu menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya sesuai dengan prinsip-prinsip yang telah ditetapkan. Untuk mendukung kemudahan akses, Kode Etik juga tersedia di jaringan intranet Perseroan, seeingga dapat diakses oleh seluruh karyawan.

Sepanjang tahun 2024, Perseroan menyelenggaramakan berbagai program pelatihan dan sosialisasi internal terkait Kode Etik sebagai upaya untuk mencapatkan pemahaman dan pengarapan etika kerja di seluruh lini organisasi Kode Etik berperan sebagai pedoman kepada bagi tersebut kanyakuan dalam melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya secara profesional dan sesuai dengan nilai-nilai perusahaan. Sebagai pentuk penegakan disiplin, Perseroan juga menerapkan mekanisme sanksi terhadap pelanggaran Kode Etik yang dilakukan oleh kanyakan.

# Code of Conduct Socialization and Enforcement Efforts

The Company consistently socialize the Code of Conducts to all employees, starting from the onboarding process and continuing throughout the employee's tenure. This initiative aims to ensure that every employee understands and internalizes the values and regulations applicable within the Company, enabling them to perform their duties and responsibilities in accordance with the established principles. To support easy access, the Code of Conducts is also available on the Company's intranet network, accessible to all employees.

Throughout 2024, the Company organized various internal training and socialization programs related to the Code of Conducts as part of its efforts to enhance understanding and application of work ethics across all levels of the organization. The Code of Conducts serves as a behavioral guideline for all employees in carrying out their duties and responsibilities professionally and in line with the Company's values. As a form of disciplinary enforcement, the Company also implements a sanction mechanism for any violations of the Code of Conducts committed by employees.

# Budaya Perusahaan

Corporate Culture

Perseroan membrilki budaya perusaan yang dibangunatas perpaduan 3 (tiga) nilai utama yang salingmelengkapi dan memperkuat. Integritas berperansegagai "ruh" yang menjadi inti dari setiap keputusan dan tindakan, mencerminkan komitmen kuat terhadapkejujuran, etika, dan kepadahan terhadap aturan dalamberbagai situasi. Nilai ini menjadi pijakan moral yangmenjaga kepercayaan antar karyawan, mitra usaha, danpemangku kepentingan. Profesionalisme menjadi "tubuh" yangmerepresentasikan integritas dalam praktik keraja sehari-hari, melalui sikap, kompetensi, dan tanggungjawab individu dalam menjalankan perannya secaraoptimal. Lingkungan kerja yang terorganisir, efisien, danberorientasi pada Hasan untuk cerminan nyata darinilai ini. Sementara itu, Entrepreneurship hadir sebagai"jiwa" yang memberikan semangat untuk terus tambuh,berinovasi, dan melihat peluang dalam setiap tantangan.Nilai ini mendorong keberanian berpikir kreatif danbertindak proaktif demi menghadirkan solusi dan nilaitambah yang berkelanjutan. Kombasinietiganyayang kekuatan utama dalam membrentuk budaya kerja yang adaptif, inspiratif, dan unggul di tengahdinamika industri.

The Company fosters a corporate culture built upon a synergy of 3 (three) core values that complement and strengthen one another. Integrity serves as the "spirit," forming the essence of every decision and action, and reflects a strong commitment to honesty, ethics, and adherence to regulations in all situations. This value acts as the moral foundation that maintains trust among employees, business partners, and stakeholders. Professionalism represents the "body," embodying integrity through daily work practices, reflected in individual attitudes, competencies, and responsibilities in performing their roles optimally. An organized, efficient, and results-oriented work environment is a tangible expression of this value. Meanwhile, Entrepreneurship serves as the "soul," instilling the drive to continuously grow, innovate, and recognize opportunities in every challenge. This value encourages creative thinking and proactive action to deliver sustainable solutions and added value. The combination of these three values forms the Company's core strength in cultivating an adaptive, inspiring, and excellent work culture amid industry dynamics.

# Kebijakan Perlindungan Data Pribadi

# Personal Data Protection Policy

Dalam rangka memastikan kepadauhan terhadap Undang-Undang No. 27 Tahun 2022 tersebut Perlindungan Data Pribadi, Perseroan memiliki Kebijakan Perlindungan Data Pribadi yang;mengatur seluruh tetapan pengolahan data pribadi di lingkungan Perseroan. Kebijakan ini merupakan wujud komitmen Perseroan dalam menjaga privasi dan kerahasiaan data pribadi, dengan menjamin bahwa penggunaan dan pengungkapan dataanya dilakukan atas persetujuan subjek data, kecuali untuk keperluan layanan, pemrosesan transaksi terkait kegiatan operasional, atau dalam rangka mendukung proses penegakan hukum.

Apabila terjadi kebocoran data yang berasal dari faktor di luar Kendali Perseroan dan berdampak signifikan terhadap masyarakat, Perseroan akan segera memberitahukan pemilik data pribadi yang terdampak serta mengambil langkah-langkah penanganan dan pemulihan yang diperlukan. Perseroan juga melakukan evaluasi secara berkala terhadap kebjikan ini guna memastikan kesesuaianya dengan perkembangan regulasi serta kebutuhan operational, dan melakukan pembaruan jika diperlukan.

In order to ensure compliance with Law No. 27 of 2022 on Personal Data Protection, the Company has implemented a Personal Data Protection Policy that governs all stages of personal data processing within the Company. This policy reflects the Company's commitment to safeguarding privacy and confidentiality of personal data, ensuring that data use and disclosure are carried out only with the consent of the data subject, unless required for service purposes, transaction processing related to operational activities, or in support of law enforcement processes.

If there's a data breach originating from factors beyond the Company's control that significantly impacts the public, the Company will immediately notify the affected data subjects and take necessary steps for handling and recovery. The Company also conducts periodic evaluations of this policy to ensure its alignment with regulatory developments and operational needs, and updates it when necessary.

# Benturan Kepentingan

# Conflict of Interest

Benturan kepentingan terjadi ketika insan Perseroan memiliki kepentingan pribadi yang berpotensi memengaruhi objektivitas dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya. Untuk mencegah hal ini, Perseroan menerapkan kebijakan yang mengharuskan seluruh karyawan dan jajaran manajemen untuk mengungkapkan secara terbuka segala;bentuk kepentingan pribadi yang mungkin berdampak pada keputusan bisnis. Setiap karyawan harus menempatkan keputusan bisnis untuk keperluan dan kepentingan Perseroan, tidak untuk kepentingan pribadi athau perusahaan lain. Setiap karyawan tidak boleh ikutserta dalam segala aktivitas yang dapat berbenturan dengan, athau memunculkan benturan dengan kepentingan dan tanggung jawab Grup Ciputra.

# 1. Bisnis Pribadi & Usaha Sampingan

Tidak boleh terlibat dalam usaha pribadi (secaralangsung maupun tidak langsung melalui temanatau keluarga) pada bisnis yang sejenis atau yangmenjadi pesaing Perseroan, sebagai supplierPerseroan, sebagai mediator/pembeli perantaraatas produk/jasa Perseroan atau yang dibutuhkanPerusahaan untuk kemudian dijual kembali, ataubisnis lain dengan bertindak sebagai pengurus aktifdari perusahaan tersebut.

# 2. Peluang Perusahaan

Apabila seorang pengurus kepada kanyakan mengetahui peluang bisnis yang diminati oleh Perseroan, ia tidak diperkenankan mengalahkan peluang tersebut untuk kepentingan pribadi (separa langsung kepada tidak langsung melalui teman, keluarga, kepada perusahaan lain).

# 3. Hubungan Keluarga

Dalam rangka menumbuhkan iklim kerja profesional, tidak dibenarkan oleh pengurus dan kanyakan yang saling memiliki hubungan keluarga berada dalam率达到 perusahaan/proyek yang sama.

Yang dimaksud dengan hubungan keluarga telahmereka yang memiliki hubungan sebagai:

Suami-lstri;atau  
- Kakak-Adik (kandung/angkat/ipar/tiri); atau  
Anak-Orang Tua (kandung/angkat/menantu-mertua).

Pengecualian untuk kasus yang sangat khususnya diizinkan apabila potensi konflik sangat minimal dan harus dijelaskan secara tertulis serta mendapat persetujuan dari 2 (dua) Direksi.

A conflict of interest arises when individuals within the Company have personal interests that could potentially influence their objectivity in carrying out their duties and responsibilities. To prevent this, the Company implements a policy requiring all employees and management members to openly disclose any personal interests that may impact business decisions. Every employee must prioritize business decisions for the purposes and interests of the Company, not for personal or other companies' interests. No employee may engage in any activities that could conflict with, or create a conflict of interest with, the interests and responsibilities of the Ciputra Group.

# 1. Personal Business & Moonlighting

Employees are prohibited from engaging in personal business (either directly or indirectly through friends or family) in businesses that are similar to or competitors of the Company, as a supplier to the Company, as an intermediary/agent for the Company's products/services, or businesses that act as an active manager of such companies.

# 2. Company Opportunities

If a management member or employee becomes aware of a business opportunity that the Company is interested in, they are prohibited from diverting that opportunity for personal gain (either directly or indirectly through friends, family, or another company).

# 3. Family Relationships

To foster a professional work environment, it is prohibited for managers or employees who have family relationships to work in the same company/ project.

Family relationships are defined as:

- Husband and Wife; or  
- Siblings (biological/adopted/in-laws/step-siblings); or  
- Parent and Child (biological/adopted/son-in-law/ daughter-in-law).

An exception is allowed only in very specific cases where the potential conflict is minimal and must be explained in writing and approved by 2 (two) Board of Directors.

# Insider Trading

# Insider Trading

Insider trading merupakan praktik ilegal dimana seseorang dengan akses ke informasi material yangbelum dipublikasikan menc gunakan informasi tersebut untuk keuntungan pribadi dalam perdagangan sekuritas. Untuk mencegah hal ini, Perseroan menerapkan kebikan yang mengatur penggunaan dan pengungkapan informasi yang material yang belum dipublikasikan. Kebikan ini mencakup larangan bagi karyawan, manajemen, dan individu untuk membeli kepada等多项 efek Perseroan berdasarkan informasi tersebut, seda kewajiban untuk melaporkan setiap transaksi yang mencurigakan.

Insider trading is an illegal practice where a person with access to material non-public information uses that information for personal gain in the trading of securities. To prevent such practices, the Company has implemented policies governing the use and disclosure of material non-public information. These policies include prohibiting employees, management, and individuals from buying or selling the Company's securities based on such information, as well as requiring the reporting of any suspicious transactions.

# Bad Governance

# Bad Governance

Bad governance merupakan kondisi pengelolaan organisasi yang tidak transparan, tidak akuntabel, ada menyimpang dari prinsip-prinsip governansi korporat yang baik. Kondisi ini timbul karena lemahnya pengawasan, penyalalahgunaan wewenang, dan ketidakpatuhan terhadap peraturan. Hal ini berpotensi menimbulkan korupsi, konflik kepentingan, serta infisiensi operasional yang bergampak negatif terhadap reputasi, kepercayaan publik, serta kinerja organisasi.

Untuk mencegah hal tersebut, Perseroan menekankan pentingnya;penerapan prinsip governansi korporat secara konsisten melalui penguatan pengawasan,peningkatan akuntabilitas,dan pelibatan aktif seluruh pemangku kepentingan guna mendukung keberlanjutan usaha secara bertanggung jawab.

Bad governance refers to a condition where the organization's management is not transparent, accountable, and deviates from the principles of good corporate governance. This arises due to weak supervision, abuse of power, and non-compliance with regulations. It can potentially lead to corruption, conflicts of interest, and operational inefficiencies that negatively impact reputation, public trust, and organizational performance.

To prevent this, the Company emphasizes the importance of consistently implementing corporate governance principles through strengthened supervision, enhanced accountability, and active involvement of all stakeholders to support the sustainable business practices responsibly.

# IKHTISAR KEBERLANJUTAN

# Sustainability Highlights

![](images/7af308ec4cb88cb45b33ae09f4863a8f428970e48ee908d7fd908a8c02c7cdec.jpg)

"Perseroan bergommen mendukung aspek keberlanjutan dengan melibatkan pemasok lokal dalam rantai Produksi, memberdayakan karyawan perempuan di berbagai posisi strategistis, dan Berkontribusi pada pelestarian keanekaragamanhayati melalui program penanaman pohon sertainisiatif lingkungan lainnya."

"The Company is committed to supporting sustainability aspects by involving local suppliers in production chain, empowering female employees in various strategic positions, and contributing to biodiversity conservation through tree planting programs and other environmental initiatives."

![](images/2b2803d1adfe5d6a2076f329b78092e02af7506c7596f6101e3d42d99d946d4f.jpg)

![](images/9ccd8c04dc8315dec760b20b135af316949592b4d0aff711d8237eee1dfbceab.jpg)

Komitmen terhadap keberlanjutan merupakan respons strategis Ciputra dalam menjadi dadapi tantangan yang semakin kompleks, mulai dari perubahan iklim, sekanan terhadap sumber daya Alam, hingga mencatingnya ekspektasi pemangku kepentingan terhadap praktik bisnis yang bertanggung jawab. Ciputra meyakini telah keberlanjutan bukananya pilihan, melainkan kepada orang untuk memastikan pertumbuhan usaha yang resilient dan relevant dans jangka panjang. Dalam setiap pengambilan keputusan, Perseroan menempatkan keberlanjutan sebagai kerangka pijakan yang tidak akan aspek Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) secara utuh.

Nilai-nilai perusaan speerti Integritas, Profesionalisme, dan Entrepreneurship++, dosar dalam menerjemahkan komitmen tersebut ke dalam praktik nyata. Ciputra terus memerkuat budaya keberlanjutan di seluruh lini organisasi dengan memastikan Bahwa setiap aktivitas pembangunan tidak oleh berorientasi pada profit, tetapi juga menciptakan dampak positif bagi masyarakat dan lingkungan. Melalui pendekatan yang adaptif dan berorientasi solusi, Ciputra menjadikan keberlanjutan sebagai ini dari strategi bisnis sekalis gus jawaban atas tantangan mata depan yang untuk ketangguhan, inovasi, dan tanggung jawab bersama.

Uraian terkait tantangan, strategi, program, pencapaian kinerja keberlanjutan Ciputra dibahas secara lebih komprehensif pada Laporan Keberlanjutan Perseroan yang disajikan secara terpisah dari Laporan Tahunan ini.

Ciputra's commitment to sustainability represents a strategic response to the growing complexity of challenges such as climate change, natural resource scarcity, and rising stakeholder expectations for responsible business practices. Ciputra believes that sustainability is not just an option, but as a necessity for ensuring long-term, resilient, and relevant business growth. In every decision-making, Ciputra integrates sustainability as a framework that fully incorporates Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles.

Corporate values such as Integrity, Professionalism, and Entrepreneurship serve as the basis for turning this commitment into tangible actions. Ciputra consistently strengthens the sustainability culture across organization by ensuring that every development initiative is not only profit-oriented, but also creates a positive impact on society and the environment. Through an adaptive and solution-driven approach, Ciputra puts sustainability at the core of its business strategy, addressing future challenges that require resilience, innovation, and collective responsibility.

A more detailed overview of Ciputra's sustainability challenges, strategies, initiatives, and performance accomplishments can be found in the Company's Sustainability Report, which is published separately from this Annual Report.

# Opini

Kami telah mengaudit laporan keuangan konsolidasian PT Ciputra Development Tbk dan entitas anaknya ("Grup"), yang terdiri dari laporan posisi keuangan konsolidasian tanggal 31 Desember 2024, seda laporan labu rugi dan penghasilan komprehensif lain konsolidasian, laporan perubahan ekuitas konsolidasian, dan laporan arus kas konsolidasian untuk tahun yang berakhir pada tanggal tersebut, seda catatan atas laporan keuangan konsolidasian, termasuk informasi kebjikan akuntansi material.

Menurut opini kami, laporan keuangan konsolidasian terlampir menjadi ini dengan keuangan konsolidasian Grup tanggal 31 Desember 2024, serta kinerja keuangan konsolidasian dan arus kas konsolidasiannya untuk tahun yang berakhir pada tanggal tersebut, sesuai dengan Standar Akuntansi Keuangan di Indonesia.

# Basis Opini

Kami melaksanakan audit kami berdasarkan Standar Audit yang ditetapkan oleh Institut Akuntan Publik Indonesia. Tanggung jawab kami menurut standar tersebut diuraikan lebih lanjut dalam paragraf Tanggung Jawab Auditor terhadap Audit atas Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian pada laporan kami. Kami independen terhadap Grup berdasarkan ketentuan etika yang relevant dalam audit kami atas laporan keuangan konsolidasian di Indonesia, dan kami telah memenuhi tanggung jawab etika lainnya berdasarkan ketentuan tersebut. # Opinion

We have audited the consolidated financial statements of PT Ciputra Development Tbk and its subsidiaries (the "Group"), which comprise the consolidated statement of financial position as at December 31, 2024, and the consolidated statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income, consolidated statement of changes in equity, and consolidated statement of cash flows for the year then ended, and notes to the consolidated financial statements, including material accounting policy information.

In our opinion, the accompanying consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the consolidated financial position of the Group as at December 31, 2024, and its consolidated financial performance and its consolidated cash flows for the year then ended in accordance with Indonesian Financial Accounting Standards.

# Basis for Opinion

We conducted our audit in accordance with Standards on Auditing established by the Indonesian Institute of Certified Public Accountants. Our responsibilities under those standards are further described in the Auditor's Responsibilities for the Audit of the Consolidated Financial Statements paragraph of our report. We are independent of the Group in accordance with the ethical requirements that are relevant to our audit of the consolidated financial statements in Indonesia, and we have fulfilled our other ethical responsibilities in accordance with these requirements. We believe that the audit evidence we have obtained is sufficient and appropriate to provide a basis for our opinion.
